text: geudaedeul moduneun hananim-ui basjul-eul hwaggohi butdeulgo bun-yeolhaji malla. geuligo geudaedeul-ege naelyeojin hananim-ui eunchong-eul tteoollila : geudaedeul-eun (seologa) jeog-ieoss-euna geu hu geubun(hananim)kkeseo geudaedeul-ui ma-eum-eul mo-eusyeoss-euni geubun-ui eunchong-eulo inhae geudaedeul-eun hyeongjega doeeossnola. geudaedeul-eun bulgudeong-iui kkeutjalag-e iss-eoss-euna geu hu geubunkkeseo geudaedeul-eul geulobuteo guhae jusyeossnola. geuleohge hananimkkeseoneun geudaedeul-eul wihae geubun-ui jingpyodeul-eul myeongbaeghi deuleonaesini geudaedeul-i indobadgi wihaeseola
